title: Unable to open blue essence orbs then the Loot page won't open
body:
Hello there ,

I have played the required game to have the two essence orbs and i saw them in my loot page but they won't open , and then i could not open the loot page and I have an error message advicing me to restart the client.

If I can get to the loot page , nothing happens when i click on the open button of the essence orb.

There is no problem with my others loots who opens normally.

Thank you for your time

Reliqua

replies.body: Hey guys, our network team is looking into this right now.  Thanks for the heads up!  In the meantime, I've individually been looking at a few accounts and do see the your capsules are rewarding blue essence.  The error message appears to just be a visual error, and you may need to relog if your updated balance isn't reflected.

I've got the same issue.
Have not received my mystery skin either, nor enough IP and I can't even access my loot page, can't see my champions, can't see/change my summoner icon, collection tab not working either and while in champ select I cannot even access the runepages. (neither when I'm outside).
I have exactly the same problem, can't see my champions, runes, loot gives the error, missions have disappeared and can't select rune page in champ select...
same for me, cant play ...
So doggone relieved i'm not the only one...
still cant open my blue essence orb
Same happening to me, i tried opening the blue essence and nothing would happen, so i restarted league and now i cant even get into the loot page...
Ok i can get into the loot page now, but cant open the orbs still :/
I have the same problem

I can open my loot tab but when i try and open any actual loot nothing happens, i can click open but then it doesn't pop up the usual window with the animation and i don't get anything (i checked) i bought a hextech m,mystery champion and also have my blue essence orbs from the mission but cannot open anything (not even use my left over worlds tokens or gemstones)

i tried forcing a repatch with the hextech repair tool 3 times and that hasn't worked for me either

EUW

The biggest issue, that's currently being looked into, is that assets aren't loading properly and giving the error message.  Some players have already received the content, but the inventory is kind of acting as a ghost.  For other players, it's still in their inventory, but just can't be looted yet.  For your specific account, I do see your mystery champ and capsules sitting in your inventory, so hang tight until this is fixed up!
Alright :) thank you for replying, makes me feel more at ease
i have exactly the same problem

I have almost the same problem.

When i try to open the Loot it comes an error.
After a while i can open it but then i cant open any BE Orb...
Hey I checked into this for you and verified that your account successfully unlocked the Blue Essence!  Looks like this was just a visual error, fortunately.
Same here :-(
Same here (EUW)
cant open the blue essence aswell ;(
I was having the same problem and i couldn't even upgrade a skin to permenant. It now works and the essences work to (for me anyway) so my guess is everything will be back to normal soon.
is that a "normal" problem, that the blue essence orbs won´t open? I received them but i can´t open them to buy new champs or things like this...?
Nope, it's a sudden issue that our network team is working on resolving currently.  I don't have an ETA just yet, but it will hopefully be fixed up in now time.

Can't open the Blue Essence Orb, and didn't get the 2 mystery Skin :/

I know Riot Games do their best tho :)
I have the same issue. Cannot open Loot or Masteries tab. I tried the Hextech repair tool but I get the same issue. I have two accounts on EUW that have this issue. On EUNE everything was ok.
same here :/{{item:3113}}

I have a problem where when i try to open my loot page it will give me the error sign saying that some of the data cannot be received and the screen will stay black. I then reopen the loot page and it will show me all of my loot but when i try to open anything or craft it nothing happens. Also when in champ select i am unable to select my rune pages. I am trying out the Hextech repair tool. Holding thumbs!!!

thanks for your time
After 15 min of waiting i finally was able to get into my loot section. But unfortunatly i still can not open my honor capsul + my blue essence orb :(
Hi still  Unable to open blue essence orbs in the look menu.
Same here, I was able to lose another game as usual so nothing changed there, but after I got all the rewards I couldn't open them.
Just dowloaded patch and can't see runes , summoner icons, loot content anything :/ basically cant play at moment. Any ideas what to do ?
thank you already sorted out!
I'm having the same issue in EUW, I can click to open but nothing appears
I opened the orbs but the essence never appeared in balance :c
i also cant open the be orbs :(
hey, i also have the same problem, my orbs wont open at all, i cant do anything with my loot
Hey, also same Problem, EUW please help.
Same for me I had so much stuff and now its all gone :( I cant even see my loot page and my blue essence is so much lower than expected. PLEASE HELP
I cant even see my champion collection.
Same here, on EUW. It won't open... :(
Same, cannot open the Blue Orbs : /

Hey,

i have the same problem, i cant open my orb.
Im having the same Problems here in EUW
Same here - EUW.
Hey Reliqua, I just checked into this for you and it does look like you got your Essence via capsules.  Looks like it was just some visual error!

Hey, this might be due to either a connection issue or bad game file.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if a force repatch might help in this case.

If the issue persists, the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should fix things up!

-- I'm seeing a lot of replies here about this.  I'll also ask around to see if something is up, and keep my eyes on this.  Is everyone impacted currently on EUW only?

I am getting the same bug. Open hextech loot page, all back, then suddenly an error message, and then it opens, but nor my hextech chests and keys nor my BE  orb works. And I have 3 key fragments to open a new chest :(
Same here
